channel.title: Main Blog
channel.description: Chris's main channel for blogs, words, and other weird thoughts

item.title: Anti-Tesla sentiment and the death of optimism (pt 1)
item.description: In this post, I use game theory concepts to examine recent media stories about Tesla and how "negativity", broadly speaking, emerges in a post-capitalist, media-heavy culture

item.title: The broader point behind "robots eating our jobs" (pt 1)
item.description: I use Marc Andreeson and Alex Payne's recent essays on hungry robots as a lens to view problems of communication. Ultimately, we'll end up with a strategy on to fight the robots.

item.title: Fear
item.description: In which I discuss my greatest fears as a focal point into my moral philosophy.
